recipesJson.name: Jam Monster - PB & Jam Strawberry (Remix)
recipesJson.author: Untitled
recipesJson.description:
Hi all,

first I should say that I never tried the original. It is quite difficult to buy the JAM Monster series in Germany.
I've heard the hype around this liquid and researched the recipe. 
After some attempts, I can say that I wouldn't buy the original because I like this version and it's satisfying for my tastebuds.

This recipe is in no way a clone. I just got inspired by the profile.
